items.preText: 4.15pm Welcome back. Out come Tamim Iqbal and Mithun. Suranga Lakmla to open. This could be a fun ride. Fasten your seatbelts.
items.text: short of a length on leg stump, nudged into the leg side
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Azman: "This score is as good as 250 if Shakib cant bat. And on this wicket, that should be enough for Sri Lanka to win it." We will have an update on Shakib shortly.
items.text: short of a length, slanted across, keeps a little low as he lets it go
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length, angled across in the corridor of uncertainty, Tamim is quite the obedient chap as he keeps the bat inside the line
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: ah, now he gets distracted and is lured like a kid is by a candy. Sticks his bat out to a back of a length away-nipper and gets beaten
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball, lures him by firing it in the corridor again, back to basics as he keeps the bat inside the line
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fullish, pushed across, left alone. Maiden to start off
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: shortish, jags away off the seam, shoulders arms
items.shortText: Chameera to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: shapes away from a good length, no shot offered
items.shortText: Chameera to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short of good length, prodigious movement off the deck, he isn't going after those
items.shortText: Chameera to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short ball that gets over middle, ducks hurriedly
items.shortText: Chameera to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short of good length outside off, punches crisply to point who dives to his left and gets a hand to it
items.shortText: Chameera to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, comes forward to defend and finds an inside edge just wide of midwicket. Uses that gap for a very quick single
items.shortText: Chameera to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length, asking him to fish at the corridor of uncertainty again, Tamim sticks his bat out and gets narrowly beaten
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: walks forward and closes the face but gets a leading edge
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Still no update on Shakib. Unclear if he will bat or not.
items.text: good length, pushes forward and gets an inside edge to square leg
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length on off, pats it towards mid-on
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: good length on off, defended back
items.postText: Mahdi Ansar: "Remembering the 2009 tri-series final heartbreak, a belligerent Murali smashed Rubel out of the park to take SL to victory who were down at 6-5 at one stage chasing 150 odd. Rubel got some back today - time for some redemption by Bangladesh!"
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: good length on off, defended solidly. Very tight start from Sri Lanka but Bangladesh must be careful not to get too ultra-defensive, especially if there are doubts surrounding Shakib's ability to bat
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: chases a really wide delivery and gets a thickish outside edge through backward point
items.shortText: Chameera to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: tucked from front of middle to midwicket
items.shortText: Chameera to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: fullish length, slanted across, crunches a drive to cover
items.shortText: Chameera to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, drops it into the covers off the backfoot
items.shortText: Chameera to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short, well-directed around the leg-stump channel, forcing him to scamper under it
items.shortText: Chameera to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length, shuffles across and blocks
items.shortText: Chameera to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length, gets slightly big as he closes the face and pops a leading edge that nearly carries to point
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mohammad Mithun, no run
